page.title: 08HEALTH IN NEWTON MEARNS
page.content:
There is no Health Centre in Newton Mearns but there are three GP surgeries. There is one small NHS hospital at Mearnskirk which has changed its function several times having been a sanatorium, an armed forces hospital, an orthopaedic, cardiac and ENT centre, and now for Geriatrics and convalescence. There is now a possibility of it again becoming an orthopaedic hospital.
Many people in Newton Mearns subscribe to Private Health care schemes eg BUPA and would use private wards in NHS hospitals or go to completely private hospitals. There are however none of these in this area.
